resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my technical skills:

work.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
work.description: Eliminated common customer issue by preventing retailers using Just Walk Out Technology from uploading store catalog until tax information is completed
work.description2: Created Kotlin API to return tax status in under 250 ms; used React Redux to call API and disable upload button upon catalog page load
work.description3: Deployed changes to production for over 60 stores across NA & EU, monitored API metrics through alarms and dashboards

work.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
work.description: Created a REST API in Kotlin to automate the creation of third-party merchant accounts to use Just Walk Out Technology
work.description2: Developed an internal portal in React which business teams can use to create merchant accounts automatically
work.description3: Increased efficiency of merchant creation by 99%; reduced workflow time from 20+ minutes to 10 seconds

work.title: IT Support Student Worker
work.description: Diagnosed over 80 software, hardware, and network issues from students and faculty within College of Sciences
work.description2: Assisted over 3000 users to transition from in-person to online classes due to COVID-19 pandemic
work.description3: Installed and purchased over 100 workstations, laptops, servers, and other pieces of equipment

work.title: Cybersecurity Intern
work.description: Improved the cybersecurity of the Data Systems Branch by securing multiple HP Color LaserJet printers
work.description2: Produced printer security documentation and technical report for future employees to utilize
work.description3: Performed vulnerability assessments on various IoT devices
